column4: What is the best way to upgrade to karmac once it is released ?
If you have done 9.04 with Ext3 which is the default, you should really clean install for  the Ext4 and Grub 2 in Karmic
If you want fast boot up and that, yep clean install so you get nice Ext4 support,  the Ext3 to Ext4 conversion probably won't be good enough
